anime.name: One-Punch Man
anime.description: Saitama, a superhero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch.

anime.name: Dragon Ball Z
anime.description: Son Goku and his friends fight powerful villains across the universe.

anime.name: Naruto Shippuden
anime.description: Naruto Uzumaki becomes the strongest ninja by mastering the Nine-Tailed Fox.

anime.name: Bleach
anime.description: Ichigo Kurosaki gains the powers of a Soul Reaper and battles powerful foes.

anime.name: Attack on Titan
anime.description: Eren Yeager and his friends fight against Titans, giant creatures.

anime.name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
anime.description: Brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric search for the Philosopher's Stone.

anime.name: Hunter x Hunter
anime.description: Gon Freecss and his friends face powerful opponents in their adventures.

anime.name: My Hero Academia
anime.description: Izuku Midoriya inherits the powerful quirk One For All and becomes a hero, facing off against villains with their own formidable powers.
